sentences.english: Furthermore, the cheat who advertises lamb but sells dog meat poisons his customers.
sentences.chinese: 更有甚者，挂羊头卖狗肉，毒也。

sentences.english: Yes, you could do some trickery here with .
sentences.chinese: 的是的，你可以在这里做一些挂羊头卖狗肉与。

sentences.english: To sell horse meat as beefsteak is their usual practice.
sentences.chinese: 挂羊头卖狗肉是他们的惯技。
